channel.title: The Checked Shirt
channel.itunes:subtitle: A look at freelance life by Jason Kneen and Ben Dodson
channel.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
channel.itunes:summary: Jason and Ben talk about freelancing, apps, and tech news with a healthy skew towards Apple.
channel.description: As freelancers who met on Twitter, Jason and Ben discuss their work, their lives, and some of their more tricky clients. They also discuss apps, computer games, and tech news with a focus on Apple.

item.title: 21. Pre-ordering HomePod, Sonos surround sound, Fortnite, Mavic Air, Landrover Discovery, App Store rejections, Native vs Web, and Homebrdige
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "Even Higher Sierra"
item.itunes:summary: In our twenty-first show we talk about HomePod pre-orders, adding Sonos Play:1 to a Sonos Playbar, Fortnite on Xbox One, the Mavic Air, Landrover Discovery, App Store Rejections, Homebridge, and how apps are going to be destroyed by progressive websites (joke).
item.content:encoded: In our twenty-first show we talk about HomePod pre-orders, adding Sonos Play:1 to a Sonos Playbar, Fortnite on Xbox One, the Mavic Air, Landrover Discovery, App Store Rejections, Homebridge, and how apps are going to be destroyed by progressive websites (joke).
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, HomePod, Sonos, Fortnite, Mavic Air, Landrover Discovery, App Store, Homebridge, native, web, tech

item.title: 20. Batteries, Parental Controls, iOS apps on macOS, HomePod, Echo, Ring, and Beats
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "Shiny! Sparkle like a wealthy woman's neck."
item.itunes:summary: In our twentieth show (after an extended Christmas break), we catch up on Ben's broken iPhone X screen, the saga of the iPhone batteries, parental controls, Circle by Disney, running iOS apps on a mac, the iMac Pro, the upcoming HomePod, and our recent purchases from Echo, Ring, and Beats.
item.content:encoded: In our twentieth show (after an extended Christmas break), we catch up on Ben's broken iPhone X screen, the saga of the iPhone batteries, parental controls, Circle by Disney, running iOS apps on a mac, the iMac Pro, the upcoming HomePod, and our recent purchases from Echo, Ring, and Beats.
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, macOS, iOS, HomePod, Circle, Echo, Alexa, Ring, Moana

item.title: 19. Updating macOS, iOS 11 date bug, macOS root exploit, HomePod, Xbox One X, Oculus Rift, and VR
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "My iphone is a bit warm, I'm going to get a Galaxy Note 7 instead"
item.itunes:summary: In our nineteenth show, we take a look at some of the recent high profile bugs to come out of Apple, the delay of the HomePod, the recent release of the Xbox One X, and Ben's purchase of an Oculus Rift. We gently gloss over Ben's unfortunate iPhone X accident...
item.content:encoded: In our nineteenth show, we take a look at some of the recent high profile bugs to come out of Apple, the delay of the Homepod, the recent release of the Xbox One X, and Ben's purchase of an Oculus Rift. We gently gloss over Ben's unfortunate iPhone X accident...
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, macOS, iOS, root, HomePod, Xbox One X, Oculus Rift, VR, Tech

item.title: 18. The Notch, maintaining old projects, maps, wireless power, iPhone X charging, phone cases, Face ID, and taxation
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "Switched my brain off - don't need it for driving"
item.itunes:summary: In our eighteenth show, we review the iPhone X with a large number of tangents into physical maps, true wireless power, phone cases, and the murky world of corporate taxation.
item.content:encoded: In our eighteenth show, we review the iPhone X with a large number of tangents into physical maps, true wireless power, phone cases, and the murky world of corporate taxation.
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, iPhone X, Freelancing, Maps, Wireless Charging, Phone Cases, Face ID, Taxation, Tech

item.title: 17. iPhone X Pre-Order, Apple's Press Strategy, Pixel 2 XL Problems, Razer Phone, iPad Multitasking, Dongles, and AstroPad Camera Button
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "You're lazy and you've failed at user interface design"
item.itunes:summary: In our seventeenth show, we discuss Apple's press stategy around the iPhone X reviews, our iPhone X pre-orders, problems with the Pixel 2 XL OLED screen, the newly announced Razer phone, multitasking on the iPad, USB-C dongles, and the AstroPad app rejection. Jason also has a few things to say about HSBCs intelligent fraud detection...
item.content:encoded: In our seventeenth show, we discuss Apple's press stategy around the iPhone X reviews, our iPhone X pre-orders, problems with the Pixel 2 XL OLED screen, the newly announced Razer phone, multitasking on the iPad, USB-C dongles, and the AstroPad app rejection. Jason also has a few things to say about HSBCs intelligent fraud detection...
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, iPhone X, Pixel 2 XL, Razer, iPad, AstroPad, Tech

item.title: 16. Twitter, iPhone X Supply & Pre-Orders, FM Radios, Pixel 2, Wireless Charging, Sonos One, and Alexa
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "The call is coming from inside the house"
item.itunes:summary: In our sixteenth show, we discuss Twitter, enabling FM Radios in the iPhone, the Google Pixel 2, Wireless Charging, the Sonos One, and the new Echo devices announced by Amazon. Ben also has a rumour regarding iPhone X supply...
item.content:encoded: In our sixteenth show, we discuss Twitter, enabling FM Radios in the iPhone, the Google Pixel 2, Wireless Charging, the Sonos One, and the new Echo devices announced by Amazon. Ben also has a rumour regarding iPhone X supply...
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, Twitter, iPhone X, FM, Pixel 2, Wireless Charging, Sonos, Alexa, Echo, Tech

item.title: 15. South West Trains, Taxes, Apple Watch Series 3, iPhone 8 / X, Design Mockups, "The Notch", TrueTone, Supply Chain, and iOS 11 setup process
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "It feels bigger in your hand"
item.itunes:summary: In our fifteenth show, we discuss Jason's failed journeys to the Big Smoke, death by taxes, our experience of the cellular Apple Watch, our usage of the iPhone 8, anticipation for the iPhone X, critical design around "The Notch", and the setup process when using iOS 11 and watchOS 4.
item.content:encoded: In our fifteenth show, we discuss Jason's failed journeys to the Big Smoke, death by taxes, our experience of the cellular Apple Watch, our usage of the iPhone 8, anticipation for the iPhone X, critical design around "The Notch", and the setup process when using iOS 11 and watchOS 4.
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, Apple Watch Series 3, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, iOS 11, Notch, TrueTone, South West Trains, Tech

item.title: 14. iOS 11 GM Leak and all the announcements from Apple's first event at the Steve Jobs Theatre
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "Hey Siri, how do I deliver a baby?"
item.itunes:summary: In our fourteenth show, we discuss the leaked iOS 11 GM beta before diving into yesterdays Apple presentation at the Steve Jobs Theatre including the Apple Watch Series 3, Apple TV 4K, iPhone 8, and iPhone X.
item.content:encoded: In our fourteenth show, we discuss the leaked iOS 11 GM beta before diving into yesterdays Apple presentation at the Steve Jobs Theatre including the Apple Watch Series 3, Apple TV 4K, iPhone 8, and iPhone X.
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, Steve Jobs Theatre, Apple Watch Series 3, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X, Apple TV 4K, Leak, iOS 11, Tech

item.title: 13. Mobile Prototyping and Design, UCS Millennium Falcon, iPhone 8 Event, Apple Watch bands, In-App Purchases with kids
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: "Rough night... my wife snores"
item.itunes:summary: In our thirteenth show, we discuss our approach to prototyping and designing for iOS / Android, the LEGO UCS Millennium Falcon, the upcoming "iPhone 8" event, Apple Watch bands, and the dangers of in-app purchases when your family account isn't working correctly.
item.content:encoded: In our thirteenth show, we discuss our approach to prototyping and designing for iOS / Android, the LEGO UCS Millennium Falcon, the upcoming "iPhone 8" event, Apple Watch bands, and the dangers of in-app purchases when your family account isn't working correctly.
item.itunes:keywords: Mobile, Freelance, Dev, Prototype, UCS Millennium Falcon, iPhone 8, Apple Watch, IAP, Tech

item.title: 12. LEGO Millennium Falcon, The Rock vs Siri 'Movie', HomePod firmware leaks, iPhone Pro, LTE Apple Watch, and the Apple SIM
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: TARDISloo leaks and HomePod leaks
item.itunes:summary: In our twelth show, we discuss the soon to be announced LEGO UCS Millennium Falcon and 'The Rock vs Siri' adverts before diving into the treasure trove of tidbits from the HomePod firmware leak including our thoughts on the iPhone Pro and its status bar along with discussion around an LTE Apple Watch.
item.content:encoded: In our twelth show, we discuss the soon to be announced LEGO UCS Millennium Falcon and 'The Rock vs Siri' adverts before diving into the treasure trove of tidbits from the HomePod firmware leak including our thoughts on the iPhone Pro and its status bar along with discussion around an LTE Apple Watch.
item.itunes:keywords: LEGO, UCS, The Rock, Siri, HomePod, iPhone Pro, LTE Apple Watch, Apple SIM, Tech, Apple

item.title: 11. Doctor Who, Nike & the iPhone 3GS, multi-tasking with iOS 11 on iPad, DJI Spark, and collecting LEGO
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: Where to put the LEGO?
item.itunes:summary: In our eleventh show, we discuss the BBC license fee, the new Doctor Who, running on a treadmill with the Apple Watch, multi-tasking on iOS 11 with the iPad, the DJI Spark drone, and our growing collections of LEGO. Ben also sings the Airwolf theme tune...
item.content:encoded: In our eleventh show, we discuss the BBC license fee, the new Doctor Who, running on a treadmill with the Apple Watch, multi-tasking on iOS 11 with the iPad, the DJI Spark drone, and our growing collections of LEGO. Ben also sings the Airwolf theme tune....
item.itunes:keywords: Doctor Who, BBC, Nike, iPhone, iOS 11, DJI Spark, LEGO, Apple, Tech

item.title: 10. New iPad Pro, iOS 11, ARKit, and connected devices we've been tinkering with
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: Going Stallone on my neck.
item.itunes:summary: In our tenth show, we discuss chiropractors, the 10.5" iPad Pro, ProMotion, ARKit, LaMetric Time, and Nanoleaf Aurora whilst still finding time to wax lyrical about the Ring Video Doorbell.
item.content:encoded: In our tenth show, we discuss chiropractors, the 10.5" iPad Pro, ProMotion, ARKit, LaMetric Time, and Nanoleaf Aurora whilst still finding time to wax lyrical about the Ring Video Doorbell.
item.itunes:keywords: iPad Pro, ProMotion, ARKit, LaMetric Time, Nanoleaf Aurora, Ring, Apple, Tech

item.title: 09. Vibram Furoshiki, Virgin Media, and a leaky tent. Oh, and WWDC (obvs)
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: Lady in a tube.
item.itunes:summary: In our ninth show, we catchup about what we've been doing over the past month before leaping into the announcements from WWDC including iOS 11, macOS High Sierra, the new 10.5" iPad, iMac Pro, and the HomePod.
item.content:encoded: In our ninth show, we catchup about what we've been doing over the past month before leaping into the announcements from WWDC including iOS 11, macOS High Sierra, the new 10.5" iPad, iMac Pro, and the HomePod.
item.itunes:keywords: WWDC, 2017, Apple, iMac Pro, iOS 11, watchOS 4, macOS High Sierra, HomePod, Virgin Media

item.title: 08. Headphones, Sonos, Amazon Echo Look & View, Siri, Alexa, Apple Store repairs and our origin stories
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: How Jason nearly became an architect and Ben moonlighted on apps
item.itunes:summary: In our eighth show, we discuss how we got into the freelance app business. We also discuss working with headphones, Sonos, the new Amazon Echo Look and View, Siri, Alexa, and the repair service from the Apple Store.
item.content:encoded: In our eighth show, we discuss how we got into the freelance app business. We also discuss working with headphones, Sonos, the new Amazon Echo Look and View, Siri, Alexa, and the repair service from the Apple Store.
item.itunes:keywords: Freelance, App, Headphones, Sonos, Amazon, Echo, Siri, Alexa, Apple Store, Tech

item.title: 07. Holidays, Drones, Mac Pro, PC Tinkering, Star Wars Episode VIII, Trailers, and the 2017 General Election
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: Living like an animal without internet
item.itunes:summary: In our seventh show, we discuss Jason's holiday and his almost barbarically slow internet. We also discuss drones (both the Mavic Pro, Bebop, and Hover Camera Passport), the Mac Pro, tinkering with PC optimisations, the Star Wars Episode VIII trailer, and the "snap" 2017 General Election.
item.content:encoded: In our seventh show, we discuss Jason's holiday and his almost barbarically slow internet. We also discuss drones (both the Mavic Pro, Bebop, and Hover Camera Passport), the Mac Pro, tinkering with PC optimisations, the Star Wars Episode VIII trailer, and the "snap" 2017 General Election.
item.itunes:keywords: Drone, Mavic Pro, Bebop, Hover Camera Passport, Mac Pro, Star Wars, Trailers, Election, UK, Tech

item.title: 06. Mac Pro, iMacs, Apple Monitors, Samsung Galaxy S8, The Nokia Game, WiFi Woes, and the Ring Video Doorbell
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: Family sharing so good it'll make you have kids
item.itunes:summary: In our sixth show, we discuss the recent announcement from Apple that the Mac Pro isn't dead. We also discuss upcoming iMacs and Apple monitors, the Samsung Galaxy S8, The Nokia Game, and Jason's recent issues with WiFi.
item.content:encoded: In our sixth show, we discuss the recent announcement from Apple that the Mac Pro isn't dead. We also discuss upcoming iMacs and Apple monitors, the Samsung Galaxy S8, The Nokia Game, and Jason's recent issues with WiFi.
item.itunes:keywords: Mac Pro, iMac, Apple, Samsung, S8, Nokia Game, WiFi, Ring Doorbell, Tech

item.title: 05. Apple's Press Release Products and speculation of an April Event
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: See if you can tell when Jason isn't listening...
item.itunes:summary: In our fifth show, we discuss our VPN usage, WiFi vs HomePlug, and Sonos speakers before moving onto the new products that Apple announced via press release yesterday. We also speculate about a possible Mac event in April and discuss how Apple names its products.
item.content:encoded: In our fifth show, we discuss our VPN usage, WiFi vs HomePlug, and Sonos speakers before moving onto the new products that Apple announced via press release yesterday. We also speculate about a possible Mac event in April and discuss how Apple names its products.
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, VPN, WiFi, HomePlug, Sonos, iPhone

item.title: 04. Nintendo Switch, Video Plus+, Old Technology, and Apple Photos
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: Piers Morgan: The shittest Bond
item.itunes:summary: In our fourth show, we discuss the Nintendo Switch before ending up on a 1.5 hour tangent about old technology we could never explain to kids. Join us on a walk down memory lane as we reminisce about VCR rewinding, Video Plus+, Minidiscs, APS camera rolls, modems, and the hassle of printers.
item.content:encoded: In our fourth show, we discuss the Nintendo Switch before ending up on a 1.5 hour tangent about old technology we could never explain to kids. Join us on a walk down memory lane as we reminisce about VCR rewinding, Video Plus+, Minidiscs, APS camera rolls, and the hassle of printers.
item.itunes:keywords: Nintendo Switch, VCR, Technology, Modem, Printer, Camera, Apple Photos

item.title: 03. Dying iMacs, Random Sewing Machine delivery, and the Nintendo Switch
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: An experiment in Beats battery life
item.itunes:summary: In the third show we talk about iMacs, the BeatsX headphones, Delivery services, Wifi Calling and Spam Calls, Lego Dimensions, TitanFall 2, The new Nintendo Switch and more!
item.content:encoded: In the third show we talk about iMacs, the BeatsX headphones, Delivery services, Wifi Calling and Spam Calls, Lego Dimensions, TitanFall 2, The new Nintendo Switch and more!
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, BeatsX, Switch, Nintendo, Zelda, Yodel, DPD, Amazon, Apple TV, LEGO, LEGO Dimensions

item.title: 02. Taxes, Apple Earnings, Freelance Prospects, Apple Watch, and VR/AR Rumours
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: Deep is the cut from the tax knife
item.itunes:summary: In the second show we talk about business taxes, saving, spending plus Apple financial results, and rumors of Apple entering VR and AR.
item.content:encoded: In the second show we talk about business taxes, saving, spending plus Apple financial results, and rumors of Apple entering VR and AR.
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, VAT, Tax, Invoicing, Business, Apple Watch, Freelance, AR, VR

item.title: 01. Lost AirPods, iOS 10.3 beta, AppStore changes and Invoicing
item.itunes:author: The Checked Shirt
item.itunes:subtitle: Not just the AirPods, but their case as well!
item.itunes:summary: In the first show we talk lost AirPods, the W1 chip, Touchbar keyboards, and more.
item.content:encoded: In the first show we talk lost AirPods, the W1 chip, Touchbar keyboards, and more.
item.itunes:keywords: Apple, Tech, Business, News, Apps, Freelancing
